name: Border Blast
description:
This is a border survival game. Shoot all the enemies and drones to survive the last. Mainly made for One Page RPG Jam.

Controls:

VOLUME HIGHLY RECOMMENDED 

Use the A and D keys to navigate around.

 E to pick up a barrel or climb a ladder. 

Q to switch guns (Only when you have three). 

Mouse to aim your gun.

 Hold S to bring up the scope. 

W or Space to Jump Click to fire the gun and KILL ENEMIES.

 R to reload your gun when you run out of bullets. 

C to enter the crafting menu, where you can make bullets, upgrades, signals, and guns. 

Click on the item or upgrade in the crafting menu to make it.

 The crafting is color coded:

 Green ~ Items 

Red ~ Upgrades

 Blue ~ Guns 

Yellow ~ Signals
